duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform a variety of cleaning/maintenance duties including but not limited to sweeping, mopping, shampooing, dusting, polishing, trash disposal, replacing light bulbs, and window cleaning.
Maintain all cleaning solutions in accordance to OSHA requirements for hazardous chemicals.
Inspect all assigned areas daily and report all cleaning and maintenance discrepancies to Supervisor.
Ensures that security procedures are adhered to at all times.
Complete daily work orders as scheduled.
Maintain the appropriate level of sanitary and cleaning supplies for assigned areas.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalency preferred.
